system.description: This spell functions like dispel evil, except that you are surrounded by flickering, yellow, chaotic energy, and the spell affects lawful creatures and spells rather than evil ones. You gain +4 deflection to AC vs. lawful creatures; you can drive a lawful creature from another plane back with a touch (Will negates); or with a touch you can dispel one enchantment from a lawful creature or one lawful spell.
system.target: You and touched lawful creature or enchantment
